jobs.job_description: The Python Software Engineer will be responsible for developing and maintaining web applications using the most current programming languages and frameworks. The successful candidate will have experience in Flask and Django Framework. Candidates will be expected to program both the front-end and back-end of web applications.
job_skills: Experience with Python programming language
Strong interest in software development and design
Proven experience with various software development frameworks
Strong analytical skills
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Exceptional problem solving skills
Experience with agile or similar methodologies a plus

jobs.job_description: The Software Engineer will be responsible for developing and maintaining the software systems within the company. The engineer will be required to have a deep knowledge of Java programming, as well as strong skills in object-oriented design, database querying, and system performance tuning.
job_skills: Proven experience in Java programming
Strong skills in object-oriented design, database querying, and system performance tuning
Thorough understanding of the principles of HTTP, DNS, and TCP/IP networking
Ability to build robust and well-tested software systems
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Strong programming skills in at least one language, e.g. Java, Python, Node.js.
Excellent problem-solving skills.
Experience working with MongoDB.
Experience with a cloud database such as Amazon AWS or Google Cloud Platform.
Excellent customer service skills.
Self-starter with a passion for technology.
Willing to relocate.

jobs.job_description: We're looking for a creative and talented graphics designer to help us create beautiful and user-friendly documents and interfaces for our software programs.
job_skills: Proficient in at least one programming language (C++, Java, Python, etc.)
Strong design skills
Experience with software design or user experience
Familiarity with common graphic design software (Adobe Photoshop, Inkscape, GIMP, etc.)

jobs.job_description: At WhiteWave Systems, we are looking for a web developer who is skilled in all programming languages. The ideal candidate will have experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery. They will be responsible for creating and maintaining websites and programming applications.
job_skills: As a web developer at WhiteWave Systems, you will be part of a team that is responsible for developing and updating our website and client software. The position is full-time and requires a degree in computer science or related field. If you are interested in this opportunity, please send your resume and cover letter to us and we will contact you to discuss further.

jobs.job_description: The cyber security analyst will be responsible for performing comprehensive analysis and research on malicious software and cyber attacks, developing solutions to secure systems, and advising management on cyber security matters
job_skills: Experience working with various programming languages
Strong knowledge of security concepts
Good problem solving skills
Excellent written and oral communication skills
Perform penetration tests and vulnerability scans on company networks
Trace and analyze intrusion incidents
Develop and implement countermeasures to protect company systems

jobs.job_description: The Linux System Administrator is responsible for the overall administration and maintenance of a Linux network and its underlying systems. Requirements for the position include knowledge of the Linux operating system, networking, troubleshooting, and system configuration. The individual should also be able to handle projects independently, and have excellent communication and problem-solving skills
job_skills: - Proficient in a programming language, such as C, Bash, or Python
- Excellent problem solving skills
- Strong working knowledge of Linux operating system
- Experience with network administration and security
- Expertise in trouble shooting and resolving system issues
- Ability to work independently

jobs.job_description: Are you a skilled developer with experience in a number of programming languages? If so, we would like to offer you a position as a DevOps Engineer. This is a role that requires experience working with a variety of programming languages, as well as knowledge of distributed systems and deployment tools.
job_skills: Good programming skills in one or more programming languages
Experience with DevOps principles and practices
Experience with automation tools (e.g., Puppet, Chef, Ansible)
Experience with code quality tools (e.g., SonarQube, Apache JIRA)
